text: Hercules: The Animated Series is a 1998 animated TV series based on the 1997 Disney animated movie Hercules. It is about Hercules during his school years at the Prometheus Academy. ==Cast== *Tate Donovan as Hercules *Robert Costanzo as Philoctetes *Corey Burton as Zeus *James Woods as Hades *Jennifer Love Hewitt as Medusa *Keith David as Apollo Category:1990s American animated television series Category:1990s American children's television series Category:1998 American television series debuts Category:1999 American television series endings Category:American fantasy television series Category:Hercules (Disney) Category:English-language television programs
title: Hercules (1998 TV series)
